SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The main application class and entry point for the Crossway game.
Board
Represents the game board with a fixed square size.
BoardChangeListener
Listener interface for receiving notifications when the game board changes.
BoardHistorySplitPane
A custom JSplitPane that contains the game board and the move history view.
BoardSize
An immutable record representing the size of a square board.
BoardSizePrompt
Abstraction for prompting the user to choose a board size.
BoardView
View component that renders the board grid and stones, scaling to fit the window while maintaining a square aspect ratio during resize.
BoundsRule
A rule that validates if a move is within the board's boundaries.
ConnectionChecker
Checks for winning connections on the game board using on-demand BFS.
CrosswayController
The main controller for the Crossway board game application, coordinating the Model, View, and user interactions.
DiagonalXRule
Validates a move against the "Diagonal X" rule.
DialogHandler
A utility class for displaying various types of dialogs to the user.
EmptyRule
A rule that validates if a move is made on an empty cell.
FileController
Controller dedicated to handling import and export operations for game files.
Game
Core game logic implementation for the Crossway board game.
GameController
Controller responsible for mediating interactions with the Game model.
GameEvents
Abstraction over UI interactions required by the GameController.
GameSerializer
Handles the serialization and deserialization of the Game state to and from JSON files.
History
A linear history implementation with undo and redo functionality.
HistoryView
Collapsible view component for displaying move history.
InvalidMoveException
An exception thrown to indicate that a requested move is illegal according to the game's rules.
JsonUtils
A utility class for handling JSON serialization and deserialization.
MenuBarFactory
A factory class for creating the application's menu bar and its sub-menus.
Messages
A utility class for retrieving and formatting localized messages from a resource bundle.
Move
An immutable class representing a single move in the game, consisting of a point on the board and the stone placed at that point.
PatternChecker
A utility class for validating game moves against a set of predefined rules.
PatternRule
An interface for a rule that validates a proposed move in the Crossway game.
PatternViolation
An immutable record representing a violation of a game rule.
Player
Represents a player in the game with a name, stone color, and win counter.
PlayerManager
Manages the two players of the game, their colors and scores.
Point
An immutable record representing a point on the game board.
ScoreboardController
Controller responsible for managing player information and the scoreboard display.
ScoreboardView
View abstraction for the scoreboard display.
Settings
 
Squares
Utility class for operations related to 2x2 squares on the game board.
Stone
Enum representing the two types of stones used in the game, Black and White.
SwingScoreboardView
Swing implementation of ScoreboardView using a JLabel.
UiController
Controller that manages the user interface components of the application.
